sQuestion: Kenji and his classmates placed colored blocks on a scale during a science lab . The yellow block weighed 0.6 pounds and the green block weighed 0.4 pounds . How much more did the yellow block weigh than the green block ?

sentences.sentence: Kenji and his classmates placed colored blocks on a scale during a science lab .
The yellow block weighed 0.6 pounds and the green block weighed 0.4 pounds .
How much more did the yellow block weigh than the green block ?
